text: Aur aik momin shaks ney ji firaon kay khandan mein say tha aur apna eman chupaye huyey tha kaha kay kiya tum aik shaks ko mehaz iss baat per qatal kertay ho kay woh kehta hai kay mera rab Allah hai aur tumharay rab ki taraf say daleelen ley ker aaya hai agar woh jhoota ho to uss ka jhoot ussi per hai aur agar woh sacha ho to jiss (azab) ka woh tum say wada ker raha hai uss mein say kuch na kuch to tum per aa paray ga Allah Taalaa uss ki rehbari nahi kerta jo hadd say guzar janey walay aur jhootay hon
